doc:
Danny Green (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_Green_(actor) 0 Danny Green (26 May 1903 – 1973) was an English character actor, best known for his role as the slow-witted ex-boxer "One-Round" Lawson in The Ladykillers.He worked in film, television and on the stage, including in the original London production of Guys and Dolls in 1953.One of his last roles was as Lord Surrey in the Randal and Hopkirk episode Just for the Record in 1969. Danny_Green ( 26_May_1903 – 1973 ) was an_English_character_actor , best_known for his_role as the_slow-witted_ex-boxer_"_One-Round_"_Lawson in The_Ladykillers.He worked in film_,_television and on the_stage , including in the_original_London_production of Guys_and_Dolls in 1953 . One of his_last_roles was as Lord_Surrey in the_Randal_and_Hopkirk episode Just for the_Record in 1969 .
